page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO LOXLEY
page.content: {Loxley,}once a village, is now a suburb of{Sheffield.}Most of the hilly area to the west is part of the{Peak {District National Park.}It consists mainly of farmland,common and{Dam {Flask reservoir.}Many legends are told about{Robin Hood,}who is said to have lived in Loxley.The area is quiet and peaceful and very popular with hikers and ramblers. The people of Loxley have a wide variety of interests and hobbies. Walking,cycling,swimming,reading, gardening,knitting,sewing,and squash being the most popular.Children enjoy swimming,football,dancing,horseriding running,cycling,golf,reading and fishing in Dam Flask and the Loxley Valley.
